price: Huu ni mteremsho wa Kitabu kisicho kuwa na shaka yoyote kinacho toka kwa Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Huu ni uteremsho wa Qur'ani umetoka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu, Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote. Na Yeye ndiye mwenye kupanga mambo yao. Hapana shaka yoyote kuwa hii imeteremka kutoka kwake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
